text: r1529061 reverted a commit. with that when we send two requests parallel, the server just waits one second before starting serving the second. In our async web application ths makes the page load very strange, some data being delayed by exactly one second.
creator: krichy@cflinux.hu

text:
This issue is about the same problem as #53693 (and other duplicate #56308).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 53693 ***
creator: merijnvdk@apache.org
